infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Neo-Nest needs camera access to capture milestone photos and videos for your baby's development tracking.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Neo-Nest needs photo library access to save and retrieve milestone photos and videos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Neo-Nest needs microphone access to record milestone videos with audio.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Neo-Nest uses location to find nearby healthcare providers and support services.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Neo-Nest uses Face ID for secure and convenient app access to protect your baby's sensitive information.
